Bases: ats_utilities.cfg_base.CfgBase

Define class GenAVR8 with attribute(s) and method(s). Load a settings, create an interface and run operation(s). It defines:

attributes:
__slots__ - Setting class slots
VERBOSE - Console text indicator for current process-phase
__CONFIG - Configuration file path
__OPS - Tool options (list)
methods:
__init__ - Initial constructor
process - Process and run tool option
